chart.searchString: index=_internal source=*metrics.log group=searchscheduler | timechart partial=false span=10m sum(dispatched) AS Started, sum(skipped) AS Skipped
chart.title: Started and Skipped - Last 24 Hours

chart.searchString: index=_internal source=*metrics.log group=searchscheduler dispatched!=0 | timechart partial=false span=10m max(max_lag) As MaxLag, eval(sum(total_lag)/sum(dispatched)) AS AverageLag
chart.title: Average Execution Lag - Last 24 Hours

chart.searchString: index=_internal source="*metrics.log" group="searchscheduler" | timechart partial=false span=10m avg(max_running) AS Running
chart.title: Avg Running Searches- Last 24 Hours

chart.searchString: index=_internal source="*metrics.log" group="searchscheduler" | timechart partial=false span=10m sum(actions_triggered) AS ActionsTriggered, sum(completed) AS Completed
chart.title: Triggered Actions, Completed Searches - Last 24 Hours

chart.searchString: index=_internal source="*metrics.log" group="searchscheduler" | timechart partial=false span=10m max(max_runtime) AS MaxRuntime, eval(sum(total_runtime)/sum(completed)) AS AvgRuntime
chart.title: Avg/Max Runtime - Last 24 Hours
